sentence: Trump-backed Georgia Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker raised almost $5.4 million in the past three months and has about the same amount in the bank.
title: candidates are getting 'crushed' in early fundraising: report

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Trump recently endorsed former television host Mehmet Oz (R) to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey (R) He also is backing former football star Herschel Walker (R) in the Georgia race against Sen. Raphael Warnock (D).
author: Elizabeth Crisp
title: Trump approval ratings still strong in key battleground states: poll

sentence: The former president's political power will be tested in the Peach State as two of his picks for office differ in the polls: former football star Herschel Walker is dominating the Republican field for Senate while David Perdue is behind in the gubernatorial primary.
author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: Trump Hugely Popular in States With Key Senate Races

sentence: ATLANTA (AP) Herschel Walker is expected to skip a second debate against his Republican rivals for a crucial U.S. Senate seat on Tuesday after missing the first one.
author: SUDHIN THANAWALA
title: Herschel Walker, other candidates test skipping debates

sentence: And on Tuesday, Herschel Walker is expected to miss a second debate against his Republican rivals for a crucial U.S. Senate seat after skipping the first one.
title: Candidates test skipping debates without upsetting voters
